intro.job-title: system and network administrator - software developer
intro.text: A very enthusiastic and driven network administrator/software developer who likes to step out of his comfort zone. Has experience with .NET, Angular and Google Cloud. In my free time, I like to delve into other technologies such as PocketBase and Flutter.

kdg.title: Karel de Grote University of Applied Sciences and Arts - Bachelor of Applied Computer Science

dt.title: Student Programmer - District Three
dt.text: At District Three I worked as a full stack developer on various web/mobile apps using the Angular/Ionic Framework.

emg.title: Junior software developer - EMG Belgium
emg.text: At EMG Belgium I am a software developer, we mainly work with .NET and WPF. I am also a graphics operator for live broadcasts such as the Tour de France, the Tour of Flanders, etc.

spelati.title: Teacher - Circus Atelier Spelati
spelati.text: At Circus Atelier Spelati, I taught circus classes every Saturday and Tuesday to children aged 8 to 15.

babab.title: Chairman - Youth Center Babylon
babab.text: Board member at Youth Center Babylon and chairman since 2023.
